comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: Robert Paul Theodor Kosch (* 5. April 1856 in Glatz, Niederschlesien; † 22. Dezember 1942) was a Prussian military officer, General of the Infantry at last, and Knight of the Pour le Mérite with oak leaves. His german wikipedia entry: de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Robert_Kosch

comment.author: 63860770@N07
comment._content: Thanks for the information B-59. We we all his full name to our record.
